'''Add-Ons Studio for Minecraft''' is an app for {{w|iOS}} developed by [[57Digital]] which was initially released in December 19, 2016. In this app can create your own Add-Ons for Minecraft [[Bedrock Edition|Bedrock]] edition.

== Purchase and availability ==
Minecraft: Skin Studio is available to buy on {{Wikipedia|App Store}} for $3.99.

The app is available on the following platforms:
* iPhone
* iPad
* iPod touch
* Apple Vision

The app supporting following languages:
* English

== Functional ==
The app provides tools for creating Add-Ons for Minecraft [[Bedrock Edition]]. In the app, you can create custom mobs and create packs by choosing its name, icon and description and then port the Add-On directly to Minecraft or to other apps as a file.
